meta.author: Subir Chowdhuri
meta.description: Ballistic Capture technique of orbital transfer for manned missions to Mars

frontmatter.summary: A recent paper proposes 'Ballistic Capture' technique of orbital transfer for manned missions to Mars. The new technique can potentially cut costs as well as allow for flexible launch timings.
frontmatter.title: Earth-Mars Orbital Transfers with Ballistic Capture
